message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it has immense potential and would be a great addition to your collection.
Alice, your offer is a good starting point. However, I'm looking to acquire this product for a price closer to $950000. I believe this price reflects the value we both see in this product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as 950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for 1050000. This price still reflects the value I believe the product holds, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While your offer is closer to my ideal price, I'm still aiming to acquire the product for a price closer to $1000000. I believe this price is fair, considering the value of the product for both of us.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement on this figure.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go all the way to 1000000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for 1075000. This price is still a good compromise, considering the value I believe the product holds.
